Asked whether he planned to stay another four years at Google to collect stock awards worth USD 100 million, Eric Schmidt said: Yes, that is my plan. Google said last month co-founder Larry Page would take over as chief executive from April 4 while Eric Schmidt would assume the role of executive chairman.
